src_original: bāhudaṇḍordhvato jñeyaḥ pariṇāhaḥ kalā nava  saptadaśāṅgulo madhye kūrpārordhe ca ṣoḍaśa /AP_44.028ab/

kūrpārasya bhavennāhaḥ triguṇaḥ kamalodbhava //AP_44.028cd/  nāhaḥ prabāhumadhye tu ṣoḍaśāṅgula ucyate /AP_44.029ab/  agrahaste parīṇāho dvādaśāṅgula ucyate //AP_44.029cd/  vistareṇa karatalaṃ kīrtitaṃ tu ṣaḍaṅgulam /AP_44.030ab/  dairghyaṃ saptāṅgulaṃ kāryaṃ madhyā pajcāṅgulā matā
tarjanyanāmikā caiva tasmādardhāṅgulaṃ vinā /AP_44.031ab/  kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhakau kāryau caturaṅgulasammitau
1 bhrūdairghyāccaturaṅgulā iti ṅa,  dviparvoṅguṣṭhakaḥ kāryaḥ śeṣāgulyastriparvikāḥ  sarvāsāṃ parvaṇordhena nakhamānaṃ vidhīyate //AP_44.032cd/
vakṣaso yat pramāṇantu jaṭharaṃ tatpramāṇataḥ  aṅgulaikaṃ bhavennābhī vedhena ca pramāṇataḥ //AP_44.033cd/
caturmukhañca tadadhoveṣṭanaṃ parikīrtitam //AP_44.036cd/  pariṇāhas tathā kaṭyā catuḥpañcāśadaṅgulaiḥ
